titles.title: Colorado Judgeship Act
Colorado Judgeship Act
To authorize additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

bill.summary:
Colorado Judgeship Act
This bill requires the President to appoint three additional district judges for the district of Colorado.
